summary: I'M LEASING A BMW 2015 WITH 10K MILES. LAST THURSDAY, DECEMBER 1ST 2016 I HAD A FLAT TIRE, A SMALL SCREW IN THE MIDDLE OF THE TIRE, PUNCTURED IT. THESE ARE RUN-FLAT -TIRES, AND THEY ARE DEFECTIVE!!! THE DEALER BMW-TOWSON CHARGE ME  $320 FOR A NEW TIRE. NOW, AGAIN, THE PASSENGER REAR TIRE IS LOSING AIR, AND NOW I HAVE TO REPLACE IT AND THE BMW DEALER WILL CHARGE ME ANOTHER $320 AND THE CAR HAS 18K MILES.THESE TIRES ARE DEFECTIVE. I CONTACTED CONTINENTAL TIRE AND TOWSON BMW SEVERAL TIMES AND THEY WON'T DO ANYTHING, I'M OUT OF WARRANTY. I'M LEASING THIS CAR AND I TAKE CARE OF IT.
